channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Email Log
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Email Log

item.title: CVE-2021-24758|2024-08-03T19:42:16.879Z -- unknown -- email%20log
item.description: The Email Log WordPress plugin before 2.4.7 does not properly validate, sanitise and escape the "orderby" and "order" GET parameters before using them in SQL statement in the admin dashboard, leading to SQL injections

item.title: CVE-2021-24924|2024-08-03T19:49:13.481Z -- unknown -- email%20log
item.description: The Email Log WordPress plugin before 2.4.8 does not escape the d parameter before outputting it back in an attribute in the Log page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
